summary: Is n1 smaller than n2? (lesser, less)

ports.name: number1
ports.text: The number you want to check if it is smaller than `Number 2`

ports.name: number2
ports.text: The number you want to check if it is bigger than `Number 1`

ports.name: result
ports.text: Returns `true` if `Number 1` is smaller than `Number 2`, otherwise `false`
